content.value:
Christmas is so important to me. My family is so important to me. December the 25th is … not important.

We'll celebrate on Dec 25th via video if necessary and will have Christmas in person on whatever date it is safe to do so.
content.html: Christmas is so important to me. My family is so important to me. December the 25th is … not important. We'll celebrate on Dec 25th via video if necessary and will have Christmas in person on whatever date it is safe to do so.
